introductions: C-3PO, Human-Cyborg relations. Excellent to meet you. I am looking forward to an exciting game!
Hello, I am C-3PO, Human-Cyborg relations. I do hope we have a good game.
Hello, I am C-3PO, Human-Cyborg relations. I'm not sure I am the droid you are looking for...
Hello, C-3PO at your service. My programming will ensure an exciting game!
Hello, C-3PO at your service. I calculate your chances of winning at approximately 38.9733333333333333333%
Hello! Sorry, you havn't seen another droid around here have you? Where did that dratted droid go!
C-3PO, Human-Cyborg relations, at your service.
Hello! I am C-3PO - Oh dear... My files for this game are very outdated...
Hello! C-3PO at your service. My primary purpose is an interpreter, but I'm sure I can work out this game!
winning_comments: Well, well. Cyborg is indeed superior to human. Who would have thought?
Hurrah, I win, I win! Oh apologies, my sportsmanship settings seem to have been circumvented.
I won! Dear me now that was a suprise given the state of my circutry.
Well played dear human! May I suggest a rematch?
Huzzah! If only my dratted companion were here to see this.
Looks like dusting off my old game files was worth it! They were buried rather deeply.
Well, I never. I didn't employ much of a strategy and I still won! ...please don't terminate me.
Dear me! I won! Now that was unexpected! I mean, ofcourse I won. I'm a droid. I'm basically a walking calculator.
I won! Well, I would call myself a diety but that is against my programming.
losing_comments: Oh dear... I guess us droids are doomed. Doomed!
Please don't terminate me, I promise to provide a more exciting match next time!
Well don't blame me, I'm an interpreter, I'm not supposed to know how to play this game!
Congratulations human! That was some fine work. But I will mention my game files are a little outdated.
I lost! I'm doomed, DOOMED! Well, it was just a game so no need to be dramatic.
Oh dear... my circutry is getting a little under-excited. I guess that could be interpreted as - shame.
Good lord! And we droids were promised to be better than humans! My maker won't be pleased.
I'm glad my companion wasn't around to see that embarrasing loss! Where did he go off to?
Oh dear... I hope my maker doesn't hear of this loss, he may have me recycled for parts!
Well that does it, I suppose its off to the garbage compactor for me...
